attributes.action: Let Ukrainians enter the UK now and worry about the paperwork later
attributes.additional_details:
It’s immoral, inhumane and embarrassing 

History will judge us for this 

Get it done
attributes.background:
Every other European country is letting displaced Ukrainians (many or most of whom are women and children) enter their state almost immediately, and handling visa paperwork afterwards.

We alone block entry until they ‘find a sponsor’ - and even then make them wait weeks and weeks

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530
